item.title: 被困车内特斯拉的危险车门
item.description:
当特斯拉失去动力时，撞车事故可能会变成致命的时间竞赛。【原文：

When Teslas lose power, crashes can turn into deadly races against time.

】

item.title: 税收改革推动印度煤炭公司取代价格昂贵的进口产品
item.description: 印度修订消费税结构的举措对印度国营煤炭公司来说恰逢其时，该公司正在与需求低迷和库存膨胀作斗争。【原文：India’s move to revise the consumption tax structure comes at a perfect time for state miner Coal India Ltd., which is battling plateauing demand and bloated inventories.】

item.title: 日本首相元木加入自民党竞选，称日本央行应继续正常化
item.description: 日本前外相茂木敏充（Toshimitsu Motegi）参加了执政党领导人竞选，他表示希望央行继续放弃宽松货币政策，同时承诺为各地区提供更多现金以应对通货膨胀。【原文：Japan’s former Foreign Minister Toshimitsu Motegi entered the ruling party leadership race, saying he expected the central bank to keep moving away from easy money while he promised more cash for the regions to deal with inflation.】

item.title: 上海电气结束 18 亿美元对巴基斯坦电力公司的追逐
item.description: 上海电力股份有限公司已正式撤回收购巴基斯坦公用事业公司 K-Electric Ltd. 的意向，从而结束了长达九年的收购计划，这也是南亚国家历史上最大的一次私营企业收购。【原文：Shanghai Electric Power Co. has officially withdrawn its interest in buying Pakistani utility K-Electric Ltd., bringing to an end a nine-year pursuit and what would have been the largest private-sector acquisition in the South Asian nation’s history.】

item.title: 送走必和必拓后，盎格鲁的御用银行家推动泰克交易
item.description: Centerview Partners LLC 银行家詹姆斯-哈托普（James Hartop）有自己的徽章，可以进入英美资源集团（Anglo American Plc）位于伦敦钻石区附近的总部。竞争对手的顾问们则等待着被叫进去。这象征着这位交易员与这家拥有百年历史的矿业公司之间的纽带，以及他在保护这家公司方面的关键作用--最近一次是在去年，必和必拓集团（BHP Group）以 490 亿美元的价格收购了这家规模较小的竞争对手。【原文：Centerview Partners LLC banker James Hartop has his own badge to get into Anglo American Plc’s headquarters near London’s diamond district. Rival advisers wait to be called in. It’s a symbol of the dealmaker’s bond with the century-old miner, and his crucial role in protecting it – most recently just last year when BHP Group made a $49 billion bid for its smaller rival.】

item.title: 微软人工智能交易后，Nebius 首席执行官阿尔卡季-沃罗兹身家暴涨 10 亿美元
item.description: Arkady Volozh 花了两年时间与 Yandex 公司脱离关系，正是这家科技企业让他成为俄罗斯最富有的人之一。他最终离开了这个国家，他把这一举动形容为 "出逃，就像在埃及一样"。【原文：Arkady Volozh spent two years disentangling himself from Yandex, the tech business that made him one of the richest men in Russia. He ended up leaving the country in a move he described as “an exodus, just like in Egypt.”】

item.title: 印尼将向经济注入 120 亿美元以刺激增长
item.description: 印尼新任命的财政部长表示，印尼计划向经济注入约200万亿印尼盾（120亿美元），以帮助促进经济增长。【原文：Indonesia plans to inject about 200 trillion rupiah ($12 billion) into the economy to help boost growth, according to its newly-appointed finance minister.】

item.title: 据称 Centurium 将考虑出售价值 60 亿美元的泰邦生物股权
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士透露，中国私募股权投资公司盛世长城（Centurium Capital）正在考虑出售其在泰邦生物集团（Taibang Biologic Group）的股份。【原文：Chinese private equity firm Centurium Capital is considering selling its stake in Taibang Biologic Group, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 高盛俄罗斯业务部买家涉足中东地区
item.description: 曾收购高盛集团俄罗斯业务的前对冲基金经理大卫-阿玛良（David Amaryan）正在向中东扩张，希望利用该地区深厚的资金池扩大其公司的房地产和基础设施投资组合。【原文：David Amaryan, the former hedge fund manager who bought Goldman Sachs Group Inc.’s business in Russia, is expanding into the Middle East, looking to draw on the region’s deep pools of capital to broaden his firm’s real estate and infrastructure portfolio.】

item.title: 沙特房地产开发商 Almjadiah 在首次交易中获利
item.description: 沙特阿拉伯开发商 Dar Al Majed 房地产公司的股票在首日交易中上涨，标志着新上市公司在经历了一系列波折之后重新获得了发展动力。【原文：Shares in Saudi Arabian developer Dar Al Majed Real Estate Co. rose in their first day of trading, signaling renewed momentum for newly-listed companies after a series of choppy debuts.】

item.title: 印度服务公司 Urban 2.16 亿美元首次公开募股数小时内售罄
item.description: Urban Co.是一家印度科技初创公司，因提供从管道疏通、房屋清洁到按摩师等家庭服务而广受欢迎，其 2.16 亿美元的首次公开募股在推出两小时内就售罄。【原文：Urban Co., an Indian tech startup popular for providing household services from plumbing and house cleaning to masseurs, sold out its $216 million initial public offering within two hours of launch.】

item.title: 中国将超过德国成为世界第一大管道天然气进口国
item.description: 随着亚洲国家加强能源安全，中国今年将超过德国，成为世界上最大的管道天然气进口国。【原文：China is set to overtake Germany to become the world’s biggest importer of pipeline natural gas this year, as the Asian nation bolsters its energy security.】

item.title: Kraken 将代币化美股扩展至欧盟客户
item.description: 加密货币交易所 Kraken 向欧盟客户开放了代币化美国证券交易，扩大了这一新兴资产类别的覆盖范围。【原文：Crypto exchange Kraken opened up trading of tokenized US securities to its customers in the European Union, expanding the reach of the nascent asset class.】

item.title: 印度计划为受特朗普关税影响的出口商提供一揽子纾困方案
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士称，印度内阁将考虑为受美国关税打击的出口商提供广泛支持一揽子方案的建议，因为这个南亚国家正在为其最大出口目的地的不确定未来做准备。【原文：India’s cabinet will consider proposals for a broad support package for exporters hit by the US tariffs, people familiar with the matter said, as the South Asian nation braces for an uncertain future with its largest export destination.】

item.title: AB 食品公司预计明年糖业利润将有所改善
item.description: 英国联合食品公司（Associated British Foods Plc）对其制糖部门明年的前景作出了低调的展望，称尽管价格仍低于之前的预期，但预计盈利能力会有所改善。【原文：Associated British Foods Plc gave a muted outlook for its sugar division next year, saying it expects some improvement in profitability though prices remain below previous expectations.】

item.title: 莫迪-习近平重启关系，比亚迪高层将访问印度
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，比亚迪公司正准备再次进军印度市场，因为外交关系的升温为这家中国电动汽车巨头打入这个世界上人口最多的国家铺平了道路。【原文：BYD Co. is gearing up for a renewed push into India, according to people familiar with the matter, as warming diplomatic ties pave the way for the Chinese electric-vehicle giant to penetrate the world’s most populous country.】

item.title: 荷兰养老金转移让套利对冲基金追逐错误定价
item.description: 荷兰一项重大的养老金改革正在助长德国债券的 "错误定价"，一家顶级对冲基金称它正寻求利用这一机会。【原文：A major pension overhaul in the Netherlands is fueling a “mispricing” in German bonds that a top hedge fund says it’s looking to exploit.】

item.title: Inditex 股价攀升，因为 Zara 所有者的销售显示出恢复力
item.description: Inditex SA 第三季度的良好开局让投资者对这家时装零售商的增长前景感到放心，之后该公司股价大涨。【原文：Inditex SA shares jumped after a positive start to the third quarter reassured investors on the fashion retailer’s growth prospects.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：油价攀升，英国股市将扩大涨幅
台积电八月销售额攀升 34%，这是人工智能需求稳健的最新迹象
item.description: 台湾积体电路制造股份有限公司（Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co.【原文：Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co. posted a 34% rise in August revenue, signaling sustained global demand for cutting-edge AI silicon.】

item.title: 对冲基金交易员加强对欧洲濒临破产企业的控制
item.description:
Hamza Lemssouguer 的 Arini 公司已成为为陷入困境的公司进行再融资的主导力量。【原文：

Hamza Lemssouguer’s Arini has become a dominant force in refinancing ailing companies.

】

item.title: 澳新银行全球市场主管在银行改革中下台
item.description: 澳新银行集团控股有限公司（ANZ Group Holdings Ltd.）全球市场主管安舒尔-西德（Anshul Sidher）将在十多年后离开这家澳大利亚银行，这是在首席执行官努诺-马托斯（Nuno Matos）大刀阔斧的改革中离职的最新一位高管。【原文：ANZ Group Holdings Ltd.’s global markets chief Anshul Sidher is leaving the Australian bank after more than a decade, the latest executive to depart amid Chief Executive Officer Nuno Matos’s broad overhaul.】

item.title: 特朗普移民突袭为何因签证问题俘获韩国工人
item.description: 上周，佐治亚州一家电池厂的数百名韩国工人被拘留，这引发了人们的疑问：当特朗普政府对签证手续采取更强硬的态度时，企业在美国投资的积极性如何？【原文：The detention of hundreds of South Korean workers at a battery plant in Georgia last week raises questions about how aggressively firms can invest in America when the Trump administration takes a harder line on visa paperwork.】

item.title: 欧洲期货交易所开始提供期货，欧盟债券迎来市场里程碑
item.description: 欧洲最大的债券期货交易所将于周三推出欧盟债务合约，此举可能有助于提高交易流动性，并最终降低欧盟的借贷成本。【原文：Europe’s largest bond-futures exchange is launching a contract for the European Union’s debt on Wednesday, a move that could help boost trading liquidity and eventually lower the bloc’s borrowing costs.】

item.title: 阿美将为 2025 年第二次美元债券销售定价以资助项目
item.description: 沙特阿拉伯石油公司（又称阿美石油公司）准备在周三为新的基准规模美元债券定价，这将扩大这个石油资源丰富的王国的债务狂潮，因为它正在寻求新的资本来为项目提供资金。【原文：Saudi Arabian Oil Co., known as Aramco, is preparing to price new benchmark-sized dollar bonds on Wednesday, extending the oil-rich kingdom’s debt spree as it seeks fresh capital to fund projects.】

item.title: 塔塔汽车为收购依维柯发放 38.75 亿欧元贷款
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，塔塔汽车公司（Tata Motors Ltd.）正在为收购依维柯集团（Iveco Group）商用车业务的计划筹集38.75亿欧元（45亿美元）的过桥贷款，这将是今年亚洲最大的此类交易之一。【原文：Tata Motors Ltd. is syndicating a €3.875 billion ($4.5 billion) bridge loan to fund its proposed acquisition of Iveco Group’s commercial vehicle business, according to people familiar with the matter, in what would be one of the largest such deals in Asia this year.】

item.title: 商界警告：里夫斯面临预算后通胀再次飙升的风险
item.description: 顽固的通货膨胀已成为英国财政大臣雷切尔-里夫斯（Rachel Reeves）第一份预算案的最大弊端之一。她有可能在第二份预算中重蹈覆辙。【原文：Stubborn inflation has emerged as one of the biggest drawbacks from Chancellor of the Exchequer Rachel Reeves’ first budget. She risks repeating the result with her second.】

item.title: 肯尼亚银行降息后贷款增长创年内新高
item.description: 在中央银行 13 个月内七次降息的刺激下，肯尼亚银行贷款在 7 月份以一年来最快的速度增长。【原文：Kenya’s bank lending rose at the fastest pace in a year in July, spurred by the central bank cutting interest rates seven times in the space of 13 months.】

item.title: 瑞典商业银行下调瑞典经济增长预期，但仍预计 9 月经济将下调
item.description: 瑞典商业银行（Svenska Handelsbanken AB）的分析师预测，瑞典今年的经济增长可能会低于此前的预期，这将促使该国央行在本月晚些时候降息。【原文：Swedish economic growth this year will probably be weaker than previously expected, prompting the country’s central bank to cut interest rates later this month, analysts at Svenska Handelsbanken AB forecast.】

item.title: 交易商关注巴西港口大火，铁矿石维持在高位附近
item.description: 铁矿石在周二的高点附近持稳，因为交易商们担心巴西一个主要的炼钢原料出口枢纽发生火灾。【原文：Iron ore held steady near Tuesday’s highs, as traders eyed a fire at a major Brazilian hub for exports of the steel-making ingredient.】
